articles.author: CNA
articles.title: 'It's terrifying': Merkel shaken as flood deaths rise to 188 in Europe - CNA
articles.description: FRANKFURT :Flash floods hit southern Germany on Sunday, killing at least one person and adding to the flooding devastation that has claimed the lives of more than 180 people in Europe in recent days.
articles.content: BERCHTESGADEN, Germany: German Chancellor Angela Merkel described the flooding that has devastated parts of Europe as "terrifying" on Sunday (Jul 18) after the death toll across the region rose to 18… [+4852 chars]

articles.description: The pope offered blessings for people affected by flooding in Western Europe, rioting in South Africa and protests in Cuba.
articles.content:

articles.title: Why have the floods in Europe been so deadly? - Eyewitness News
